features.title: A dead simple

features.feature1_d: Wait, what? - Yeah, it's totally free!
features.feature2_d: add your own feature or run it on your infrastructure!
features.feature3_d: It's simple. Quick and easy recording of training sessions
features.feature4_d: No ads, no opt-out cookies, no pop-ups, no chatbots, no clickbait (okay, except for a little bit).

info.description: Tired of writing down your workouts in a notebook? Try a free online strength training diary! Record your achievements, track your progress and improve your training program - all in one convenient ad-free service. Turn your gym sessions into an exciting journey to new records! üí™
info.cleanUpQuestion: Are you sure you want to clear all account data?
info.deleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

price.description: Dead simple plan unlocks everything. No bundles. No add-ons.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.header: Find answers to common questions below
faq.q1: What makes your app different from other workout logs?
faq.a1: The app is minimalistic, completely free and extremely easy to use. There are no adverts, complicated features or distractions - just a convenient way to record your workouts and track your progress.
faq.q2: Is the app really free? Are there any paid features?
faq.a2: Yep, the app is completely free and requires no subscriptions. You get full access to all features with no hidden fees.
faq.q3: How can I see my progress?
faq.a3: Only on the scale and in the mirror. We're working on an analytics dashboard.
faq.q4: Who can I contact for support?
faq.a4: There's no support here, you're alone.
faq.q5: Is the app suitable for those who are new to working out?
faq.a5: Of course it is! The simplicity of the interface makes it ideal for beginners. You can easily record basic exercises and track your results without being overwhelmed by unnecessary details.
